name: HouseHunting
0:
”Alexa, start house hunting”
”Alexa, open house hunting”
”Alexa, begin house hunting”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: house hunting
Developer Terms of Use
des:
House Hunting is the quickest way to find out how much it costs to live in the neighborhood you're in now, or anywhere in the country.

This skill will ask about the location you're looking in and some basic requirements. It will search local listings, give you a short summary of prices, and send details to your Alexa app so you can follow up later.

Search nearby:

If your device supports location services, such as a mobile phone or in-car Alexa-enabled device, this skill can search around your current location. To enable this feature you will have to grant permission to access your location in the skill settings in your Alexa app. You may also need to enable location services and have the Alexa app open.

Find homes by location:

If location services are not available or you haven't granted permission, you can check home prices just by providing a zip code for the skill to search. Just launch the skill and specify any 5-digit zip code in the United States.

Search Results:

The skill provides a spoken summary of prices in your search location, and sends a report to your Alexa app for reference. If you are using a display device, you will also see your results on screen. All current shapes and sizes of Alexa device are supported.

This skill was created as part of the DevPost #AmazonAlexaConversationsChallenge.
